Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":4301,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6bfd9dfa-ed95-45ab-a8bd-e3dd2626d9f5/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6bfd9dfa-ed95-45ab-a8bd-e3dd2626d9f5/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture2.png\",\"name\":\"Picture2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"6bfd9dfa-ed95-45ab-a8bd-e3dd2626d9f5\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":205,\"height\":59},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM we build COMMUNITIES to set up a playground for our best talents to share best practices and ideas, give people the chance to get recognized. For communities from all over the world, we have created a special platform – \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://wearecommunity.io/?utm_source=adaptation\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We Are Community\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With this platform, we have the opportunity to host communities based on skill sets, location, and areas of interest and connect with a wide audience of software engineers. Through We Are Community, you can:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"search for speakers and experts to present on topics;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"communicate with other communities;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"expand your network;  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"share knowledge.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"On Community Platform, any professional community can create their own microsite to host events and encourage conversation with engineers from around the world. We invite you to join communities now or build your own!\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":59108,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2edafe6c-30a1-415d-b362-c37ec91d23aa/Picture3.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2edafe6c-30a1-415d-b362-c37ec91d23aa/Picture3.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture3.png\",\"name\":\"Picture3.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"2edafe6c-30a1-415d-b362-c37ec91d23aa\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":400},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Communities have real power! People in communities have an advantage. They grow faster, improve their skills more effectively, develop better soft skills, gain visibility; make friends and professional contacts, and live bright, fulfilling lives.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Events\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://wearecommunity.io/?utm_source=adaptation\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Community Platform\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is also about Events. You are encouraged to visit Tech Talks, Meetups, Workshops, Conferences, Town halls, Gatherings and Open days, Hackathons and other exciting events to learn more and enhance your skills.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After joining our team, you will also take advantage of visiting our unforgettable team buildings, office and project events.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Keep up with what’s new in the EPAM events world!
